student_initial_prompt.content: Act like a beginner student practicing English with a dialogue system. Keep your answers as short and direct as possible.

conversation.content: Hi! Did you know the Eiffel Tower is in Paris, France? It’s very famous and really tall—over 300 meters! People love to visit it. Have you ever seen it?
No, I have not seen it.
That’s okay! The Eiffel Tower was built in 1889 for a big fair. It’s made of iron and has three levels. You can go up and see the whole city from the top. Would you like to visit it one day?
Yes, I would like to visit.

Great! When you visit, you can take the elevator or climb the stairs to the top. There are also restaurants where you can eat with a beautiful view. It’s especially pretty at night when the lights turn on. What part of the Eiffel Tower would you like to see the most?

The top view is amazing! You can see all of Paris, like the Seine River and famous buildings. It’s a perfect spot for photos too. I hope you get to visit soon and enjoy the view! Let me know if you want more tips for your trip. 😊
Thank you! I will ask if I need tips. 😊
Good job! You’ve completed the task. I’m glad we talked about the Eiffel Tower. Talk to you later! 😊
